definition: king or monarch/best or strongest of its type/grand/great
Michelle Kwan (1980-), former American figure skater, Olympic medalist
Lee Lai-Shan (1970-), former windsurfing world champion from Hong Kong
red coral/precious coral (Corallium rubrum and several related species of marine coral)
Sassanid Empire of Persia (c. 2nd-7th century AD)
Susan Boyle (1961-), competitor in UK reality TV competition
precious coral/red coral (Corallium rubrum and several related species of marine coral)

sentences.english: Every knows that Sammy's the biggest apple-polisher in our company.
sentences.chinese: 大家都知道珊咪是我們公司最大的馬屁精。

sentences.english: And Jobab died, and Husham of the land of Temani reigned in his stead.
sentences.chinese: 約巴死了，毯螅地的人戶珊接續他作王。

sentences.english: The next day, Samantha and I went to the Valley for Fendi bags.
sentences.chinese: 第二天，莎曼珊和我去山谷區找芬迪牌皮包。

sentences.english: Selina cut herself while peeling an apple.
sentences.chinese: 當珊珊在削萍果皮時，她割傷了自己。

sentences.english: He totters and falls into the arms of Roxane and his friends.
sentences.chinese: 他踉踉蹌蹌倒在了羅克珊和他朋友們的手中。

sentences.english: When Jobab died, Husham from the land of the Temanites succeeded him as king.
sentences.chinese: 約巴死了，提幔地的人戶珊接續他作王。

sentences.english: Can LuoShanShan will kill murderer at large?
sentences.chinese: 能將殺死羅珊珊的兇手逍遙法外嗎？

sentences.english: Can LuoShanShan will kill murderer at large?
sentences.chinese: 能將殺死羅珊珊的兇手逍遙法外嗎？

sentences.english: Can the media stop mentioning Kim trashian in every sentence?
sentences.chinese: 媒體能不能不要每句話都提到金卡戴珊那個渣渣？

sentences.english: Joshua, Heather and Timm, they are deep inside of wisdom, in their twenties and thirties.
sentences.chinese: 愛書華，範思聰和珊珊都是二三十歲的人，充滿智慧。

sentences.english: Joshua, Heather and Timm, they are deep inside of wisdom, in their twenties and thirties.
sentences.chinese: 愛書華，範思聰和珊珊都是二三十歲的人，充滿智慧。

sentences.english: Ali and high shan together to redeem the house property card.
sentences.chinese: 艾莉和高珊珊一同去贖回了房產證。

sentences.english: And when Jobab was dead, Husham of the land of the Temanites reigned in his stead.
sentences.chinese: 約巴死了，毯螅地的人戶珊接續他作王。

sentences.english: Tomorrow， Sandra will carry out the garbage.
sentences.chinese: 明天珊多拉將會收拾垃圾的。

sentences.english: If I were Sandra, I would not tell the truth.
sentences.chinese: 如果我是珊卓拉，我就不會說出實話。

sentences.english: Chen Shanshan is a senior Kindergarten teacher.
sentences.chinese: 陳珊珊，幼兒園高級教師。

definition: used in the transliteration of people's names
angelica (type of iris)/plant root used in TCM
phonetic fei or fi/elegant/phi (Greek letter Φ, φ)
see 莎草[suo1 cao3]/see 摩莎[mo2 suo1]
